title: Fizz E bug
body:
I was playing an ARAM and got fizz. But occasionally when i used my e the opposing blitz could knock me up in the middle of casting e (when i should have been untargetable). i don't know if this was because i was using the super galaxy skin or not, but it happened.

I also couldn't put a video or photo on here because it only happened occasionally.

Pls riot respond because i have no idea why it happened and i'm confused.

replies.body:
If blitz pressed E and clicked you there's no way to avoid it (even untargetability).
It looks like a bug, feels like a bug, but is an intended side effect of the Blitz E changes a few patches ago.

Sorry I don't have better news OP.
ty for the reply, i was so confused that game :/

Sure thing^^  I had a similar Fizz ARAM game experience.
I hope you don't mind, but I scrolled down to your other question about Lux ulti, and by any chance was Lux being displaced at the same time?
Kinda like this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDiWQxPmaPg
There's also some info/discussion on it here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/7cMvo0dr-lux-ultimate-hitbox-also-q
(it's an old thread, but similar ones show up from time to time)
Srry that i awnser so late (have school and stuff), but no, she wasn't displaced in any way.

Hmm, a head-scratcher then... I'll make a mental note of it and I'll keep watch for it in my games too.  Thanks for the info about it^^

If it pops up again I'll at least know when it started :)

If you can reproduce this 100% of the time with Fizz and Blitz, then I would post it on the [Bug Report boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) I've never heard of this issue, but I'd be interested to hear if it can be reproduced or not.

Let me know if you have any questions.

ty for responding.

And yes i have another question, this time it's about lux her ult hitbox.

I don't know if you will be able to tell me the awnser, but maybe you can ;).

It was also in ARAM that every time the enemy lux ulted, i would get hit even when there was at least 2 times my hitbox size in between me and the marker before lux ults (was playing as the new yorick). 
I was wondering if this was if it is supposed to be like that or not.

p.s. sorry for the late response.
